name: @midnight-ntwrk/testkit-js-e2e
description: E2E tests for Midnight JS packages
author: IOHK

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist reports coverage logs tsconfig.build.tsbuildinfo .rollup.cache managed midnight-level-db
scripts.build: yarn compact && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs && yarn compact-copy
scripts.e2e: docker compose -f ../compose.yml pull && DEBUG='testcontainers:compose' NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules vitest --config vitest.config.ts run
scripts.e2e-debug: docker compose -f ../compose.yml pull && DEBUG='testcontainers:containers' NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules vitest --config vitest.config.ts run
scripts.e2e-testnet: MN_TEST_ENVIRONMENT=testnet-02 DEBUG='testcontainers:compose' NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules vitest --config vitest.config.ts run
scripts.e2e-groups: docker compose -f ../compose.yml pull && DEBUG='testcontainers:containers' NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules vitest --config vitest.groups.config.ts run
scripts.compact: yarn fetch-compactc && yarn compact-counter && yarn compact-simple && yarn compact-counter-clone && yarn compact-block-time
